feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:03 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 8:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
